item.title: Take Heed!
item.description: Take heed to yourself is a command given in Luke 17:3. And a quick read of the words is recorded for our understanding as we read on to an “important passage on forgiveness”. The focus of attention shifts rapidly from this oft repeated caution as other instructions are dealt with in Luke. Applying our mental brakes to halt and study this opening phrase is relevant to using the teaching that follows it and actually the teaching of the whole the Bible.
